name: Everlasting Summer: Miku Root for the Original Script
name_original: Everlasting Summer: Miku Root for the Original Script
description:
Everlasting Summer: Miku Root for the Original Script is an indie game. It was originally released in 2016. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Everlasting Summer: Miku Root for the Original Script is available on PC.
